pages.text: Conductite is a new metal added by Terramity.$(br2)Conductite can be obtained by crafting together iridium, black matter, and circuit boards.$(br2)Black matter can only be obtained after defeating the Trial Guardian.

pages.title: Conductite
pages.text: Conductite holds the power of electricity.
The smithing template drops from the Trial Guardian, and must be used on iridium to upgrade.
